Package simple.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomDraw
    Interface intended to be used as a way to customize how drawing is done on widgets.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    Widget object.
    DrawModule
    Class with methods for drawing to a Graphics2D object and manipulating colors.
    Image
    Object that works as an overhead for the BufferedImage object.
    ImageBox  
    Label
    A floating text box that is uneditable.
    ScrollBox
    Provides the basic framework for other ScrollBox types.
    ScrollDialogBox  
    ScrollListBox<WidgetType extends Widget>  
    Slider
    Silder widget class.
    TextBox  
    TextEntryBox  
    Vector
    The Vector class simply holds two double values, x and y, and has a variety of ways to manipulate them.
    Widget
    Generic Widget class.
